methods.name: return_single
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a return statement for a single object.

ref_name.description: A reference name to be used to identify the name of the object as was defined earlier in the query

returned_name.description: The returned name of the object. If none provided, the returned name is {ref_name}

methods.name: return_multiple
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a return statement for mutiple objects.

mappings.description: The mapping (or a list of mappings) of db property names to code names, to be returned
